newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-WILKINSON SET TO JOIN F.A. AS TECHNICAL COACH.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-WILKINSON SET TO JOIN F.A. AS TECHNICAL COACH.

text.p: Former Leeds and Sheffield Wednesday manager Howard Wilkinson is expected to be formally announced as the first technical director of the English Football Association (F.A.) on Monday.
The 53-year-old Yorkshireman will work alongside England manager Glenn Hoddle overseeing the development of soccer at grass-roots level.
A former school-teacher, Wilkinson has also worked as a non-league manager, an F.A. regional coach, an assistant manager of the England Under-21 side and chairman of the League Managers' Association.
He guided Leeds to the English league title in 1992 but was sacked by the Elland Road club this season after a series of poor results.
